[Fresh Ingredients](/Feats.aspx?ID=6340) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 202 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Herbalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=252)

**Prerequisites**
[Herbalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6339)

</column>

---

It is amazing the difference fresh herbs can make. When using [Natural Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=5182) to [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=2399), you gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness. If you do this in the wilderness, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus instead.
